entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OSR tests failing in jit-experimental pipeline #86125
    8.0.0
  • CentOS 8-based source-build legs failing in CI #86124
  • Light up Utf8Utility.*.cs and Utf16Utility.*.cs with Vector512 code paths. #86119
  • Question about instruction groups #86117
  • Regression on INTEL machines with TechEmpower Fortunes #86113
  • Required memory PHIs are not added for un-analyzable memory stores by SSA #86112
    Future
  • [hot reload] Support the GenericAddFieldToExistingType capability in Mono #86111
  • [API Proposal] Make System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator constructor protected #86110
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add EntityHandling property to XmlReaderSettings #86107
  • Threads with non-default stack size do not contain a guard page #86105
    Future
  • Interop source generators and analyzers should use HashCode.Combine to implement GetHashCode #86104
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe rundown happening at the end of a session #86103
    8.0.0
  • Type.IsValueType doesn't get folded if not followed by typeof(T) directly #86101
    Future
  • Interaction between implicit dynamic conversion and ref / in parameter chooses the incorrect overload. #86118
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add body content to HttpRequestException #86095
  • HttpClient false-negative dependency traces #86094
  • Wasm SDK tests #86087
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe/ETW/PerfMap rundown can report wrong optimization tier #86086
  • [API Proposal]: Uuid data type #86084
  • [NativeAOT] Link-time-optimize unmanaged portions of the runtime on Linux #86083
    8.0.0

Closed

  • This operation is not supported on .NET Standard as Reflection.Emit is not available #85025
  • Implement minimal `Vector512` hardware accelerated lowering in the JIT #80811
    8.0.0
  • Optimize `lsraRegOrder` and `buildPhysRegRecords` to skip non-AVX512 registers if AVX512 not available #81847
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Linux-arm64 llvmfullaot build fails with missing libclang-9.so.1 #85529
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-diff and superpmi-replay is failing with fatal error #86082
  • Invalid ROL/ROR logic when accessing array element on x86 #86027
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 2+3) #67156
    Future
  • [wasm] ReferenceError: SharedArrayBuffer is not defined. /p:WasmEnableThreads=true #71196
    8.0.0
  • IPv6 multicast, multicast group joins on not selected network adapter with .net SDK installed #83336
    Future
  • HttpClient call is giving 104 connection reset by peer after migrating to .net 6.0 #84138
    Future
  • OSX build error: Removing global symbols from a final linked no longer supported #85600
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.BootTime doesn't work on Android #83816
    6.0.x
  • Android: IsolatedStorageFile path changes #83231
    7.0.x
  • Can we have better doc on inner loop workflow for testing runtime changes in a BlazorWasm app? #85413
  • [NativeAOT] Argument out of range in MetadataFieldLayoutAlgorithm.ComputeSequentialFieldLayout #86044
  • Vector{128|256}<T> == Vector{128|256}<T> could emit PXOR + PTEST combo on x86 #85638

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Reorder urllib and remove --force-reinstall but keep pinned version #86128
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make the STJ source generator cache friendly #86121
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update portable linux source-build legs to use AlmaLinux to better represent building on RHEL8 #86114
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an SSA bug from the `ASG` refactoring #86108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Implement JIT support for the arm64 Crc and Dp intrinsics… #86106
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86097
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Added float32 support and implemented all R4 opcodes #86092
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix emitOutputInstr #86078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Clean up shared ArrayPool naming and add some env var config #86109
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Fix jit calls and interp entry wrappers #86120
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • Add necessary subset of wide char APIs to minipal #86055
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Support ConfigurationBinder.GetValue in source-gen #86076
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Hardcode the path to libclang from Mariner, not Clang 9 on CentOS 7 #86096
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure DecomposeRotate correctly orders parameters. #86066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix printing of arcs for local stores #86098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make casting helpers look more like in CoreCLR #86029
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] loader ES6 module #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm]Set SelfContained=true for browser-wasm runtimes #86102
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimizations for Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #85926
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Skip ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle if COM interop is not supported #85813
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Another attempt to prevent stripping exported symbols from executables when explicitly specified #86050
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some nullable annotations / null handling in System.Text.Json #86077
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove generated locals in RegexCompiler.LoadSearchValues #86010
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Handle cctor dependency on RVA static access #86081
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Add integration tests for PreserveSig and use the MemberFunction calling convention by default in the ComInterfaceGenerator #86072
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Allow linking out some runtime code on wasm. #86079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix the emission of nonnull metadata on loads. #86071
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Move most runtime callbacks into the MonoRuntimeCallbacks stru… #86080
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix official build after removing win-arm runtime build #86074
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete Windows arm32 support #86065
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Write generic method, write complex signatures like array/pointer/generics #86026
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and wasm packedsimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [wasm] Disable the PackedSimd.Shuffle intrinsic. #86025
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the process. #85649
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Current developer experience #2266

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: map Ilc opimisation settings to emcc #2263

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Build for wasi sdk #2268

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI produces TupleElementNamesAttribute reference in addition to the tuple itself #32458
  • Error MSB4184: The expression "[MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals('', 8.0)" cannot be evaluated. Version string was not in a correct format. #32457
  • dotnet mage - setting Processor flag to amd64 throwing error when Launcher.exe is added #32445

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] corrected strings in containers #32456
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #32447
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Update 303 branding #32461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add warning for optional workload EOL #32426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • [release/7.0.4xx] removed restriction on Publish SDK to allow publishing non-web project #32422
    Area-Containers
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189

Closed

  • My thoughts on the primary constructor #7187

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals working group notes 2023-05-10 #7190
  • Fix link to implemention status in Readme #7188

Merged

  • Remove bullets from breaking-change-warnings.md speclet #7185

Updated

  • Collection literals: add type inference #7171
  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0051 false positive #68162

Closed

  • Multiple "CodeStatements" for "CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement" possible? #68159
  • Stackoverflow in binding when building System.Runtime with nightly Roslyn build #68172
  • Operator '.' cannot be applied to operand of type 'void' #68163
  • BUG: Expression is always false #68153

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Report generator failures when emitting solution updates #68170
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Cleanup ArgumentOutOfRange exception for LSP.Range #68168
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use a singleton sentinel for empty type-parameters for non-generic named-types and methods. #68131
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Limit amount of tokens used to calculate LCS distance #68151
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add RequiresNonDocumentChangesTag to ProjectOptionsChangeAction #68160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Passing IServiceProvider to AddTransientHttpErrorPolicy like AddPolicyHandler #48200
  • Updating dotnet from 7.0.102 to 7.0.203 causes user creation failure looking for a non-existent package #48199
  • Make Blazor Wasm SubDomain Routing Internal #48197
  • Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal triggering SSO redirect to AAD three times in rapid sequence #48196
  • Hot reload does not work and throws exceptions #48195
  • Clarify intentions for dynamic preventDefault #48193
  • gRPC transcoding supports custom HttpRule #48192
  • Backport the fix for #42966 to NET6 as it's LTS #48189
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48188
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #48187
  • If InvariantGlobalization is enabled by default, SqlClient will throw an exception #48186

Closed

  • Support all error's status codes ProblemDetail types for generating swagger docs in MinimalApi #47705
  • CA1854 analysis errors when building with latest 8.0 Preview 5 build #48052
  • API http.sys: EnableKernelResponseBuffering #47777
    8.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #48135
  • Blazor WASM memory keep on increasing, GC not working as expected #48166
  • Memory leak when using RenderFragment in Blazor component #48063
  • Memory retained when a blazor component uses Linq Any method in it #48065
  • W3CLogging Bug - Not Working as Documented #48170
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc, plaintext #48119
  • The method that validates the client certificate is not executed #47955
  • .NET 7 Preview 7 ProblemDetailsService is not working as expected. #43261
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [SignalR - Typescript client] Make the client SSR Frameworks compliant #46708
  • HubConnectionBuilder object fails to build in VS2022 plugin. #46767
  • SignalR - Connect - Response 404 No Connection with that ID - No Scaling #46929

PullRequests

Created

  • Missing dot. #48202
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add support for HttpRule types to gRPC JSON transcoding #48194
    area-grpc
  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 6.0.18
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • Pin M.CA dependency versions used in RDG #48179
    area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove use of legacy interop preventing CSP compliance in Blazor WebAssembly #48182
    area-blazor
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Scrolling of Editor and Label placed in ScollView does not work. #15044
  • Problem with MAX_PATH #15042
  • Is it possible to create a foreground service with with a constructor with parameters? #15039
  • [Windows] Flyout changes page's content width. #15033
  • CA1416 no longer fixed by OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast(XX) on MAUI 7.0.86 #15032
  • Type.GetProperties does not return non-public properties from inherited type on Android #15031
  • Frame's IsClippedToBounds default value behavior is incorrect on Android. #15029
  • Switch control off state style is inconsistent between iOS and Android #15028
  • combine two or more maui apps into one msix #15027
  • Error type 3 Error: Activity class {} does not exist. #15026
  • BindableLayout placed inside Border does not render elements correctly on iOS. #15025

Closed

  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Shell SearchBarHandler only show the first item and and not correctly #7155
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Can not debug MacCatalyst app when CodeSigning is enabled #14762
  • Button not honoring MaximumWidthRequest on iOS, Mac, and Android #15002
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use new PrependToMapping method #15041
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Wait for root page to load before processing modal #15037
  • Clear out the renderer on VCR when disconnected #15036
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix crash using SearchHandler #15034
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Update DEVELOPMENT and README to make it clear that you need to run the build tasks. #15030

Merged

  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Make layout honor MaxWidth and MaxHeight requests #15022
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [WIP] Dev/update mappers #14948
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
  • Just trying out some things #15000
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    control-flyout
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Android] Allow to use system fonts #15010
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • untheorized access exception on running dotnet ef migration bundle command #30876
  • When using SplitToTable cannot use json column #30874
  • The CancellationToken in a TaskCanceledException on ToListAsync does not match #30873
  • .HasComputedColumnSql does not writes data #30872

Closed

  • Decimals being truncated in EF Core #30858
  • Add $type to jsonb if decorated with JsonDerivedTypeAttribute #30865
  • ExecuteUpdate ExecuteDelete methods are thread safe ? #30875

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Find the releases dll in the correct path #16380
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #16378
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16374

Merged

  • Update branding for 303 #16373
  • Update the publish tests to handle both self contained and not #16365
  • GenerateLayout.targets: use ResolveAssemblyWarnOrErrorOnTargetArchitectureMismatch. #16368
  • Change the name of the file and add tizen. #16195

Updated

  • Add lock comment to loc all of the .NET product strings #16347
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Publish checksums (#15803) #16264
  • vmr-build: add job that builds a Mono runtime. #16357
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2178562 #16348
